hint: Tie both inputs of a NAND gate together. NAND(A,A) = NOT(A). This proves NAND can build NOT!
title: NOT from NAND
objective: Build an inverter using only NAND
description: Demonstrate NAND universality: create a NOT gate using a single NAND with tied inputs. NAND(A,A) = NOT(A AND A) = NOT(A).
